law.catch_line: After investigation of a consent election under § 4-212 or § 4-213 of this subtitle, the Mediation...
law.text:
After investigation of a consent election under § 4-212 or § 4-213 of this subtitle, the Mediation Service shall:
prepare a report, including any recommendation, on the investigation; and
serve the report on each party to the consent election.
